CustomField.formula:
IF(
Account.Customer_Won_Date__c > IF(TODAY() >= DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),1,1) && TODAY() <= DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),3,31),DATE(YEAR(TODAY())-1,10,1), IF(TODAY() >= DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),4,1) && TODAY() <= DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),6,30),DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),1,1), IF(TODAY() >= DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),7,1) && TODAY() <= DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),9,30),DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),4,1), IF(TODAY() >= DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),10,1) && TODAY()<= DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),12,31),DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),7,1),null)))) && Account.Customer_Won_Date__c < IF(TODAY() >= DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),1,1) && TODAY() <= DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),3,31),DATE(YEAR(TODAY())-1,12,31), IF(TODAY() >= DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),4,1) && TODAY() <= DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),6,30),DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),3,31), IF(TODAY() >= DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),7,1) && TODAY() <= DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),9,30),DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),6,30), IF(TODAY() >= DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),10,1) && TODAY()<= DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),12,31),DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),9,30),null))))
, "New Business", "Existing Business")
CustomField.label: Commission V02 Existing vs New Business
